desc:
Fixed
using anti-anti-antidotes via the automatic [use] box in Doc G no longer fails.
clicking on a gremlin zone directly after talking to Yossarian correctly identifies the gremlin zone now.
removed 'Explore Next Square' after you find the rat faucet.
yoinked items now show up when you run away via any means.
When faced with the Giant Desktop Globe tower monster, the NG will be correctly selected all the time.
New
incorporated Pirate Insult Tracking from JHunz' script.
absinthe-minded now always links to the worm wood (still only lights up on 9/5/1 turns remaining).
